title: The Bethesda Handbook of Clinical Hematology, 3E [Epub][StormRG]
description:
TITLE/EDITION The Bethesda Handbook of Clinical Hematology
By: Griffin P. Rodgers (Author), Neal S. Young (Author)
Paperback: 512 pages
Publisher: LWW; Third edition (May 20, 2013)
Language: English
ISBN-10: 1451182708
ISBN-13: 978-1451182705
NOTE: This is the standalone ebook and may not include access codes that come packaged with the bound book

___________________________________________________________________________________



Packed with essential information on the diagnosis and treatment of blood and bone marrow disorders, The Bethesda Handbook of Clinical Hematology, Third Edition should be carried in the white coat pocket of the student, resident, or hematology/oncology service and in the briefcase of the internist, hospitalist, family practitioner, and pediatrician who sees patients with blood diseases.
